title: What is Jekyll? How to use it?
description: Jekyll is a static site generator. You give it text written in your favorite markup language and it uses layouts to create a static website.
content: Jekyll is a simple, blog-aware, static site generator perfect for personal, project, or organization sites. Think of it like a file-based CMS, without all the complexity. Jekyll takes your content, renders Markdown and Liquid templates, and spits out a complete, static website ready to be serv...
